definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: And smoothing an eyebrow with a dampened little finger used by males to denote effeminacy in other males.
sentences.chinese: 用潮溼的小指梳理眉毛，暗諷某男士有女人氣。

sentences.english: Feel the little finger edge of your hand.
sentences.chinese: 摸一下你手掌的小指一側。

sentences.english: Marie wears a ring on her little finger .
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗在她的小指上戴了一隻戒指。

sentences.english: Unwind and strike the wall with the little finger edge of your stiffened out right hand.
sentences.chinese: 展體用你右手小指一側打擊牆壁。

sentences.english: One of them noticed a gold ring on the murdered girl's little finger.
sentences.chinese: 一個強盜注意被殺的女孩小指上有一個金戒指。

sentences.english: Pinky rings have met their match in wristbands.
sentences.chinese: 如今，小指戒指有了手鍊與之搭配。

definition: to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
the five fingers of one's hand
